column4: hello there. I have a weird problem. Last night my mouse went crazy and then everything went back to normal, since then when I minimize a window it doesn't show on the panel, the only way I can get focus of the window is by using ALT+TAB... does anyone knows why is this happening?
Everytime I minimize a window it doesn't show the minimized button on the panel, does anybody know why please?
Everytime I minimize a window it doesn't show the minimized button on the panel, does anybody know why please?
add a pager to the pannel ?
